SEARCH
Module codes
Package codes.arrays

Interface ConversionTable<T>

Type Parameters:
T - Takes in the type of element fo the class.
All Known Implementing Classes:
ArrayBreaker
public interface ConversionTable<T>
Interface ConversionTable, is implemented in class ArrayBreaker which is used to break the parts of the arrays of double and triple dimension.
Author:
Trishit Maji
